cztctl.short: A cli tool to generate go-zero code
cztctl.long:
A cli tool to generate api, zrpc, model code

GitHub: https://github.com/lerity-yao/go-zero 
Site:   https://go-zero.dev

api.short:
Generate api related files
根据 api 文件生成相关项目文件
api.api:
The api file
api 文件位置
api.dir:
The target dir
生成项目文件夹

dart.short: Generate dart files for provided api in api file

format.stdin: Use stdin to input api doc content, press "ctrl + d" to send EOF
format.declare: Use to skip check api types already declare, deprecated if cztctl version >= 1.8.3

go.short: Generate go files for provided api in api file

rabbitmq.short: Generate go files for provided rabbitmq in api file(根据 api 文件生成 rabbitmq 服务)
rabbitmq.test:
Generate test files
生成测试文件
rabbitmq.type-group:
Generate type group files
types分组

new.module: Custom module name for go.mod (default: directory name)

kt.short: Generate kotlin code for provided api file
kt.pkg: Define package name for kotlin file

ts.short: Generate ts files for provided api in api file
ts.unwrap: Unwrap the webapi caller for import

swagger.short: Generate swagger file from api(根据 api 文件生成 swagger 文档)
swagger.filename:
The generated swagger file name without the extension
生成的 swagger 文件名称，不包含后缀
swagger.yaml:
Generate swagger yaml file, default to json
生成 yaml 类型的 swagger, 默认是 json

docker.exe: The executable name in the built image
docker.go: The file that contains main function
docker.base: The base image to build the docker image, default scratch
docker.port: The port to expose, default none
docker.version: The cztctl builder golang image version

deploy.name: The name of deployment (required)
deploy.secret: The secret to image pull from registry
deploy.replicas: The number of replicas to deploy
deploy.revisions: The number of revision history to limit
deploy.port: The port of the deployment to listen on pod (required)
deploy.nodePort: The nodePort of the deployment to expose
deploy.targetPort: The targetPort of the deployment, default to port
deploy.imagePullPolicy: The image pull policy of the deployment, default to IfNotPresent

check.short: Detect cztctl env and dependency tools

gateway.short: gateway is a tool to generate gateway code

protoc.short: generate gateway code from proto file

protoset.short: generate gateway code from protoset file

server.short: generate gateway code from grpc server

mysql.ignore-columns: Ignore columns while creating or updating rows
mysql.prefix: The cache prefix, effective when --cache is true

datasource.table: The table or table globbing patterns in the database

ddl.src: The path or path globbing patterns of the ddl

pg.prefix: The cache prefix, effective when --cache is true

datasource.table: The table or table globbing patterns in the database
datasource.schema: The schema or schema globbing patterns in the database

mongo.easy: Generate code with auto generated CollectionName for easy declare [optional]

migrate.long: Migrate is a transition command to help users migrate their projects from tal-tech to zeromicro version
migrate.version: The target release version of github.com/zeromicro/go-zero to migrate

quickstart.service-type: specify the service type, supported values: [mono, micro]

new.module: Custom module name for go.mod (default: directory name)

protoc.multiple: Generated in multiple rpc service mode

template.home: The cztctl home path of the template

update.short: Update template of the target category to the latest

revert.short: Revert the target template to the latest
revert.name: The target file name of template

global.home:
The cztctl home path of the template, --home and --remote cannot be set at the same time, if they are, --remote has higher priority
本地模板的地址, --home 和 --remote 一起输入时, --remote优先级别高
global.remote:
The remote git repo of the template, --home and --remote cannot be set at the same time, if they are, --remote has higher priority
The git repo directory must be consistent with the https://github.com/zeromicro/go-zero-template directory structure
远程托管模板的地址, --home 和 --remote 一起输入时, --remote优先级别高
global.branch:
The branch of the remote repo, it does work with --remote
远程托管模板的分支
global.style:
The file naming format, see [https://github.com/zeromicro/go-zero/blob/master/tools/goctl/config/readme.md] 
代码命名格式化
